comment: This class and material will be a little difficult for everyone but Yifan Zhang makes it easy and enjoyable somehow. I found myself actually enjoying the excel work which is 99.99% of the class btw so prepare to learn a lot in excel. He will respond to ALL of your emails quickly. (he responded to me at 2AM) TAKE HIM
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: This professor is so sweet. Do the assignments (there are 6) and study for the exams (2) and you'll do great. He is available for assistance if you need it. Class can be difficult but it's doable! TAKE HIM.

Professor Yin truly cares about the success of his students. His lectures are not only recorded live, but available at all times, so if you miss something you can always go back and watch class again. The assignments weren't easy to me, but I went to him for help on all of them and he always made sure I left understanding everything.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: This guy is a great Professor! Attend his class and get quizzes for extra-credit on your exams. They will definitely save your life. Be sure to do all assignments on time and you will finish this class with at least a B. If you want an A, be sure to ask questions, take notes, and practice scenarios for the exam. That is literally the blueprint.
The most amazing course I have ever taken so far! He really cares about everyones opinion and respects you. You will learn A LOT and its super awarding, nobody should ever miss the class.

Professor Zhang was amazing and extremely understanding. If you put in the work, he will do his best to ensure the best grade possible for you. Three exams, multiple quiz options, five assignments, and two excel assignments so a pretty good amount of grades. Responds quickly, do your best and communicate with him and you'll be fine. Good luck!

This class is worth the challenge. A lot of the class is brief yet informational lectures, and excel based labs. He is very flexible when test time comes around by either curving grades, or he will take out sections that he feels it was to challenges based on the homework assignment grades.

There is a definite effort but the man is genuinely just not very good at explaining things. I could take notes on an entire class and by the end of it everything he said went over my head. He makes things more complicated by never actually working out problems by hand and instead just showing steps in powerpoints or excel.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: If you are looking for a rewarding challenge, then this is the perfect course. There is a good balance between theoretical learning and coding. A good knowledge of mathematics and mathematical statistics is required. He is very helpful to those who need help. This is a highly recommended course.
Professor Zhang covered most part of data mining. Of course, you need advanced mathematics skills to finish the homework. He is also helpful for those in need. Highly recommended!
He covers very heavy mathematical topics. Your calculus skills must be excellent to take his class. However, his lectures are very inspiring.
